lead_paragraph: Ethiopia, one of five countries the IAAF governing body says is in "critical care" over its drug-testing systems, is to carry out doping tests on up to 200 athletes.

headline.print_headline: Ethiopia Plans Mass Tests Amid Doping Concerns
headline.main: Ethiopia Plans Mass Tests Amid Doping Concerns
